errors.error_description: The installation instructions mandate installing a system-level package `python3-vtk7` using `apt-get`. This is an unnecessary dependency for the core library, specific to Debian-based systems, and may conflict with the version required by pip.
correction_candidates: Remove the `sudo apt-get install python3-vtk7` command. Python dependencies, including `vtk`, are handled by `pip` when installing the package.
Replace the `apt-get` command with `pip install vtk`.
Replace the `apt-get` command with `conda install vtk`.
Update the package name to a more recent version, like `python3-vtk9`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the `sudo apt-get install python3-vtk7` command. Python dependencies, including `vtk`, are handled by `pip` when installing the package.
